page.title: 08SPORTING FACILITIES
page.content: In{Weeley}and around the{Weeley Heath area, the only sporting facilities are the football club and the tennis court which closed down about 5 years ago. The nearest sports centre is in{ {Little Clacton. In the area of{Weeley Heath}the majority of the inhabitants are elderly and so the only form of recreation is gardening. As the majority of people do a lot of gardening, the{Kidby's Nursery}is very successful. This nursery sell a wide variety of produce such as cabages, tomatoes, etc. In a small survey that I conducted, I found that{10%}of the people were sporting and{90%}were satisfied with gardening. All the childen in the area play on the fields near the football club where there are swings and slides.
